description: Schema for a context generated by the IAB Spiders & Robots enrichment

category.description: Category based on activity if the IP/UA is a spider or robot, BROWSER otherwise

primaryImpact.description: Whether the spider or robot would affect page impression measurement, ad impression measurement, both or none

reason.description: Type of failed check if the IP/UA is a spider or robot, PASSED_ALL otherwise

spiderOrRobot.description: true if the IP address or user agent checked against the list is a spider or robot, false otherwise
